entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
